metadata.synopsis: Players are trying to use a recovery pod (like in the tutorial) that's disabled because there's nobody in the attached bed (or pod, art still TBD).
metadata.how_to_trigger: In SCL_Main_A, click on any of S_COL_RegenStation1_5e5596d1-dd18-409c-b060-d4d01d664146S_COL_RegenStation2_a87a8d2f-c84c-474f-9dee-d4e9612ae0ffS_COL_RegenStation3_7ad215a8-c134-4e8f-b0ae-fa7bac14a1b5

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like it siphons power from anyone lying in that cradle. Wonderful.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: It needs to draw power from a host. How very illithid.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Inactive. What powered the one on the nautiloid?
